Package com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.spi

package com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.spi
Defines the Service Provider Interface (SPI) for Cloudhopper generators.

Generator modules must implement DeploymentConfigGenerator to participate in the Cloudhopper code generation process.

The SPI allows full control over how deployment artifacts are generated from annotated source code.

  • Zugehörige Packages
    Package
    Beschreibung
    com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api
    Defines shared types used to configure and support deployment config generators.
    com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.annotations
    Contains annotations used by generator implementations to declare supported features.
